## 3. Refund Policy

After this period, it will not be possible to issue a refund under any circumstances, except as provided by law.

## 4. Privacy and Data Protection

- Information related to the acquired access keys.

This data will be used **exclusively for administrative, authentication, statistical, communication, and product access control purposes**.

We commit to:

- Store and handle the data securely and responsibly;
- Not share, sell, or disclose the data to third parties without the owner's consent, except when legally required;
- Comply with applicable data protection laws, such as the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), when applicable.

By using our services, the user agrees to the collection and use of this information as described in this section.

If you wish to request the removal or modification of your data, please contact us through the store's official channels.
